org.resthub.oauth2.filter.service
Class CachedExternalValidationService

java.lang.Object
  org.resthub.oauth2.filter.service.ExternalValidationService
      org.resthub.oauth2.filter.service.CachedExternalValidationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ValidationService
public class CachedExternalValidationService
extends ExternalValidationService

Implementation of the token validation service, that caches token during their lifetime to avoid unnecessary calls to the central authorization service.

setDiscardPeriod

public void setDiscardPeriod(java.lang.Integer discardPeriod)
Used by Spring to inject the cache discard period

Parameters:
discardPeriod - Number of seconds an expired token is kept in the cache.

validateToken

public Token validateToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
Validates the token and returns all token informations.
If no token information is found, returns null. otherwise, return the permissions.

Validation on the presence and syntax of the access token have been made, so semantic checks must be implemented here.

Specified by:
validateToken in interface ValidationService
Overrides:
validateToken in class ExternalValidationService
Parameters:
accessToken - The access token extracted from the request.Never null.
Returns:
The corresponding token informations. Null if no token information where found.
